abilities.name: Silver Weave
abilities.details: Whenever Clair casts an ability, she receives a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/] (maximum three), granting her a [sh]shield[/] that lasts for a few seconds (expire duration is per stack, but shield value cannot be stacked).[n]Clair can walk to a nearby ally hero and transfer the <span>Silver Weave[/] stack to them, granting them a [sh]shield[/] as well.[n]Enemy heroes can also receive a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/], causing them to take bonus [ap]magical damage[/] when attacked by ally heroes' [db]basic attacks[/].

abilities.name: Gleaming Lance
abilities.details: Clair thrusts her lance in a line, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit.[n]Enemy heroes struck by <span>Gleaming Lance[/] receive a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/].

abilities.name: Argent Charge
abilities.details: Clair targets an allied hero (or herself) and grants them a burst of [ms]movement speed[/]. If Clair has a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/] on her, this ability will transfer one stack of <span>Silver Weave[/] to the target.[n]Using <span>Argent Charge[/] will generate a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/] due to Clair's passive, which can only be transferred after the cast (meaning this will not be transferred to the targeted ally via the casting of this ability).

abilities.name: Shimmer Burst
abilities.details: Clair releases a burst of silver energy in a cone, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit and [db]slowing[/] them for a short duration.[n]If an enemy hit is marked with a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/], they are [db]stunned[/] instead of slowed.

abilities.name: Sentinel's Embrace
abilities.details: Clair channels briefly, then slams her lance down, creating a massive silver dome at her location that persists for several seconds.[n]While inside the dome, all allies and enemies are unable to be targeted by [bf]abilities[/] or [bf]basic attacks[/], as well as being unable to use any [db]abilities[/].[n]When allies exit the dome, they will receive a stack of <span>Silver Weave[/].
